titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation commanding all His Majesties subjects and servants that have any office, place, or fee, of his guift or grant, forthwith to give their attendance upon his person
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford the twenty second day of March, in the ninteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
